enumtype.name: org.rapidbeans.rapidenv.config.cmd.ShortcutWindowStyle
enumtype.description: The constants like defined in MS VB help.

enum.name: normalFocus
enum.description: The window will be shown with its last (original) size and position and it will have the focus.

enum.name: minimizedFocus
enum.description: The window will be shown in minimized (iconified) form and it will have the focus.

enum.name: maximizedFocus
enum.description: The window will be shown in minimized form and it will have the focus.

enum.name: normalNoFocus
enum.description: The window will be shown with its last (original) size and position but it will not have the focus. The Focus stys where it was before.

enum.name: minimizedNoFocus
enum.description: The window will be shown in minimized (iconified) form but it will not have the focus. The Focus stys where it was before.
